thread.section_title: The Inn At The Spanish Steps - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: location, location, location
thread.title_full: location, location, location - Review of The Inn At The Spanish Steps, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: lazyoaf
title: location, location, location
text:
And the title of the review sums it all up. Is it a beautiful and well appointed hotel.. Well not really, if it was 500 yards away would it be so desirable?.. well no, not really. This hotel isnt bad, but its also definately not great.
Its near to main attractions and its kept clean and tidy..
Very typical european hotel that trades mainly on its location to iconic places really.
Room Tip: get as high up as you can See more room tips
